item.description:
Join me for a day of salsa dancing. You can find me with my usual grey fedora hat for the first 2 hours. I will probably take the hat off after a few hours of dancing. My cell numbers is 617-435-4233. Text me if you can't find me..


Want to add some Cuban body movement to your salsa?

… learn to dance authentic Cuban Rumba or Timba?

…plus find out more about Cuba, and how YOU can go?

…or just want to spend a Sunday afternoon dancing with friends?

Join Yesenia Selier Fernandez & MetaMovements on Sunday, March 7 for “Sabor Cubano!”

Yesenia is one of the top experts in Afro-Cuban culture, dance and music living in the US. Read her bio here: http://www.metamoveme...

Location: 119 Windsor St Gym, Cambridge, MA
**FREE Street & Lot Parking on Sundays**

12:00-1:30 FREE Cuba Open House & Report-Back with 2009 Travelers

3 special workshops *30% OFF with Adv Purchase!

1:30 Timba & Casino: The Cuban Styles of Salsa (2 separate levels)
2:30 Cuban Body Movement (Open Level)
3:30 Rumba (Open Level)

Followed by DJ DMartinez and our popular Monthly Social Dance Party!

4:30-7:30 ▪ Friendly dancers of all levels
▪ Dance to the best salsa music
▪ Smooth spacious hard-wood floors
▪ Live Dance Performance
▪ FREE with workshops or $10 regular price
▪ “Bring-A-Friend Discount!” -- $6 for each of you

Special Discounts

1) Pay in advance for an Early Bird discount

2) Take 2 or 3 workshops and get a Multi-Class discount

3) Come to any part of the event, and there is a 30% discount to Ryles afterwards


For advance ticket sales & more information:

www.metamovements.com/sunday

metamovementsdance@gmail.com
(617) 983-1418


--

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Yesenia Selier Fernandez & MetaMovements
